# accessibilityValue()

**Instance Method**

Returns the switch’s value.

## Declaration

```swift
func accessibilityValue() -> String?
```

## Return Value

The value for the switch.

## Discussion

This method is the getter for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibilityProtocol] protocol’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibility-c.protocol/accessibilityValue] property.

## Supporting Accessibility

- **accessibilityPerformDecrement()**: Decrements the switch’s value.
- **accessibilityPerformIncrement()**: Increments the switch’s value.
title: accessibilityValue()
